download these: fakeroot_1.12.4ubuntu1_i386, dkms_2.1.0.1-0ubuntu1_all, bcmwl-kernel-source_5.10.91.9+bdcom-0ubuntu4_i386, patch_2.5.9-5_i386 on packages.ubuntu.com
install them first, fakeroot, then bcmwl, then patch, then dkms. then reboot
